actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to grant the consent of Congress to the construction of certain causeways in connection with highway construction in the State of Louisiana.

summary.text: Grants the consent of Congress for the construction of causeways and similar structures across navigable waters of the United States for the construction of specified highways in Louisiana.

titles.title: A bill to grant the consent of Congress to the construction of certain causeways in connection with highway construction in the State of Louisiana.
